info.title: Google Calendar API Methods
info.description: This specification enables interaction with the Google Calendar API, allowing users to create, update, delete events, manage calendars, handle availability, and set permissions.

flows.title: List Calendars
flows.description: Lists all calendars in the user's calendar list.

parameters.name: maxResults
parameters.description: Maximum number of calendars to return

parameters.name: minAccessRole
parameters.description: The minimum access role for the user in the returned entries

parameters.name: showDeleted
parameters.description: Whether to include deleted calendar list entries

flows.title: Create Calendar
flows.description: Creates a new Google Calendar with specified details.

timeZone.description: The time zone of the calendar.

flows.title: Delete Calendar
flows.description: Deletes a secondary calendar. Use calendars.clear for clearing all events on primary calendars.

flows.title: Get Calendar
flows.description: Gets metadata for a calendar.

flows.title: Update Calendar
flows.description: Updates metadata for a calendar.

timeZone.description: The time zone of the calendar.

flows.title: Patch Calendar
flows.description: Updates selected fields of a calendar.

timeZone.description: The time zone of the calendar.

flows.title: Clear Calendar
flows.description: Clears all events from a primary calendar.

flows.title: Create Event
flows.description: Creates a new event in a specified calendar.

timeZone.description: Time zone of the start time
Time zone of the end time

flows.title: Delete Event
flows.description: Deletes a specific event from a calendar.

flows.title: List Events
flows.description: Lists events from a calendar with optional filters.

parameters.name: maxResults
parameters.description: Maximum number of events to return

parameters.name: timeMin
parameters.description: Lower bound for event start time

parameters.name: timeMax
parameters.description: Upper bound for event start time

flows.title: Import Event
flows.description: Imports an event into a calendar.

timeZone.description: Time zone of the start time
Time zone of the end time

iCalUID.description: Event unique identifier as defined in iCalendar format

flows.title: Quick Add Event
flows.description: Creates an event based on a simple text description.

parameters.name: text
parameters.description: The text describing the event to be created

flows.title: Watch Events
flows.description: Watch for changes to events in a calendar.

id.description: A UUID or similar unique string that identifies this channel.

type.description: The type of delivery mechanism used for this channel.

address.description: The address where notifications are delivered.

flows.title: Get Event
flows.description: Returns an event.

flows.title: Patch Event
flows.description: Updates an event. This method supports patch semantics.

flows.title: Update Event
flows.description: Updates an event.

flows.title: Get Event Instances
flows.description: Returns instances of the specified recurring event.

flows.title: Move Event
flows.description: Moves an event to another calendar.

flows.title: List ACL Rules
flows.description: Lists the rules in the access control list for a calendar.

flows.title: Insert ACL Rule
flows.description: Creates an access control rule.

role.description: The role granted by this rule (reader, writer, owner)

type.description: The type of scope (user, group, domain)

value.description: The email address or domain name

flows.title: Watch ACL Changes
flows.description: Watch for changes to ACL resources.

id.description: A UUID or similar unique string that identifies this channel.

type.description: The type of delivery mechanism used for this channel.

address.description: The address where notifications are delivered.

flows.title: Delete ACL Rule
flows.description: Deletes an access control rule.

flows.title: Get ACL Rule
flows.description: Returns an access control rule.

flows.title: Patch ACL Rule
flows.description: Updates an access control rule. This method supports patch semantics.

role.description: The role granted by this rule (reader, writer, owner)

flows.title: Update ACL Rule
flows.description: Updates an access control rule.

role.description: The role granted by this rule (reader, writer, owner)

type.description: The type of scope (user, group, domain)

value.description: The email address or domain name

flows.title: Add Calendar to List
flows.description: Adds a calendar to the user's calendar list.

colorId.description: The color of the calendar in the user's calendar list

hidden.description: Whether the calendar is hidden in the user's calendar list

selected.description: Whether the calendar is selected in the user's calendar list

summaryOverride.description: The summary that the authenticated user has set for this calendar

flows.title: Watch Calendar List
flows.description: Watch for changes to the user's calendar list.

id.description: A UUID or similar unique string that identifies this channel.

type.description: The type of delivery mechanism used for this channel.

address.description: The address where notifications are delivered.

flows.title: Remove Calendar from List
flows.description: Removes a calendar from the user's calendar list.

flows.title: Get Calendar List Entry
flows.description: Returns a calendar from the user's calendar list.

flows.title: Patch Calendar List Entry
flows.description: Updates a calendar entry in the user's calendar list. This method supports patch semantics.

colorId.description: The color of the calendar in the user's calendar list

hidden.description: Whether the calendar is hidden in the user's calendar list

selected.description: Whether the calendar is selected in the user's calendar list

summaryOverride.description: The summary that the authenticated user has set for this calendar

flows.title: Update Calendar List Entry
flows.description: Updates a calendar entry in the user's calendar list.

colorId.description: The color of the calendar in the user's calendar list

hidden.description: Whether the calendar is hidden in the user's calendar list

selected.description: Whether the calendar is selected in the user's calendar list

summaryOverride.description: The summary that the authenticated user has set for this calendar

flows.title: List Settings
flows.description: Returns all user settings for the authenticated user.

flows.title: Watch Settings
flows.description: Watch for changes to user settings.

id.description: A UUID or similar unique string that identifies this channel.

type.description: The type of delivery mechanism used for this channel.

address.description: The address where notifications are delivered.

flows.title: Get Setting
flows.description: Returns a single user setting.

parameters.name: setting
parameters.description: The id of the user setting

flows.title: Stop Channel
flows.description: Stop watching resources.

id.description: The ID of the channel to stop.

resourceId.description: The resource ID of the channel to stop.

flows.title: Get Colors
flows.description: Returns the color definitions for calendars and events.

flows.title: Query Free/Busy
flows.description: Returns free/busy information for a set of calendars.
